levelList.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 100% of the HP damage dealt (max 100)
[WhenUse] If the target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Consume up to 60 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodArmor] for every 6 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain +3 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 10 [BloodArmor] (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Laceration]
- At 50%+ HP, gain 10 additional [Laceration] and +1 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] Increase damage by 3% for every [Laceration] on target
levelList.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 4 - Sundering

levelList.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 100% of the HP damage dealt (max 100)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 60 [BloodDinner]: gain 1 [BloodArmor] and Base Power +1 for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed (Max 6)
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 10 [Laceration], and activate [Laceration] immediately. Lose 1 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Laceration]
- At 50%+ HP, gain 10 additional [Laceration] and +1 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] Increase damage by 3% for every [Laceration] on target
levelList.name: Sancho Arts 3 - Ambush

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Laceration] Count
- If this Skill consumed 30 [BloodDinner], inflict +2 additional [Laceration] Count

[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Laceration] Count
- If this Skill consumed 30 [BloodDinner], inflict +2 additional [Laceration] Count

[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [Paralysis] next turn
- If this Skill consumed 30 [BloodDinner], inflict 2 additional [Paralysis]

levelList.desc:
This unit's HP does not drop below 1 while using this Skill.
On Hit with this Skill: heal 100% of the HP damage dealt (max 200)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 80 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [BloodArmor] for every 6 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain +3 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Laceration]
- At 50%+ HP, gain 15 additional [Laceration] and +1 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] Increase damage by 3% for every [Laceration] on target
[BeforeAttack] At 10+ [BloodArmor], Atk Weight +1
<style="highlight">- At 20+ [BloodArmor], replace the above effect with Atk Weight +2 instead</style>
<style="highlight">- At 30+ [BloodArmor], replace the above effect with Atk Weight +3 instead</style>
[EndSkill] Consume <style="highlight">10</style> [BloodArmor] for every Atk Weight gained
[WhenUse] If the target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Increase damage by 5% for every [BloodArmor] on self
levelList.name: Armadura de Sangre

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Activate [Laceration] on the target once (target loses 1 [Laceration] Count)
[OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodArmor] on self, apply 2 [AttackUp] next turn to 3 random allies (Max twice per turn)
[OnSucceedAttack] Activate [Laceration] on the target once (target loses 1 [Laceration] Count)
[OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodArmor] on self, apply 2 [AttackUp] next turn to 3 random allies (Max twice per turn)
[OnSucceedAttack] Activate [Laceration] on the target once (target loses 1 [Laceration] Count)
[OnSucceedAttack] At 10+ [BloodArmor] on self, apply 2 [AttackUp] next turn to 3 random allies (Max twice per turn)
[OnSucceedAttack] Activate [Laceration] on the target once (target loses 1 [Laceration] Count)

levelList.desc:
[DuelCounter]
On Hit with this Skill: heal 100% of the HP damage dealt (max 200)
[BeforeUse] At 15+ [BloodArmor], use 'Armadura de Sangre' instead
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 10 [BloodArmor] (max 2)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 3)
